ValidationRule.description: Validation to restrict the updation of Tier Adjustment Type for Government accounts
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Account.Sales_Segment__c), 'Government'), APT_STE_Pricing_Tier__c = 'Tier 6', OR(ISPICKVAL(APT_Tier_Adjustment_Type__c , '1 Tier Up'),ISPICKVAL(APT_Tier_Adjustment_Type__c , '2 Tier Up') )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For tier adjustment, please contact pricing support team via Deal Support Request (DSR)
